title: Pikachu face emote. We want it now (please)!
body: Am I the only one that is waiting for Rito-san to release a "Pikachu face meme" emote (preferably Gnar's face)? While we are on the topic of Amazing ideas. "Poro Gnar Skin", "Project Rakan" (and Xayah). If not possible, I will be happy with Project Rakan (or all of the above). Thx Rito (P.S. Delete Teemo (just kidding of course)). Who agrees (I will give you a high five if you back me up)?

replies.body: if they want to be sued for copyright infringement sure

How do you sue someone for a facial expression? XD
lmao it's not like their using Pikachu as the emote
